price: ߥߟߴߊ߬ ߖߌ ߦߋ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߜߍ߯ߙߍ߫ ߸ ߌ ߕߴߛߋ߫ ߖߌ߫ ߢߌߣߌ߲߫ ߠߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߏ߬ ߞߐ߫
arabic: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوۡرٗا فَلَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: aw yuṣ'biḥa māuhā ghawran falan tastaṭīʿa lahu ṭalaban
